EmailTemplate.description: IN USE When Program Manager approves Funding opportunity, email is sent to Funding Opportunity Owner
EmailTemplate.name: FAP - Program Manager approves Funding opportunity email to FO Owner
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: {!Announcement__c.AnnouncementId__c} has been Approved.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Announcement__c.OwnerFirstName}, This email is to notify you that, the Announcement # {!Announcement__c.AnnouncementId__c} has been Approved for the Program # {!Announcement__c.Program__c}. Kindly login to the EGMS Systems and click here to see Announcement details. Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task. Sincerely, EGMS Team
